title: Hyatt is Offering Diamond Status Matches via Twitter The Points Guy

type_specific.selection: Not thrilled about the pending Marriott and Starwood merger? Hyatt’s got your back. The global hotel chain, which often offers status challenges, is back with an even better offer. This time, Hyatt is offering status matches, granting you instant status (up to Diamond) through February of 2017. It’s a fantastic initiative, and seems to be available...
